description: Details required for Condition 5 (Landscape Scheme) of planning permission 19/01043/FUL (Change of use of existing A1 retail unit at 9 High Street to B1(a) office use to allow for the enlargement of, and internal and external improvements to Apex Tower entrance and reception; single storey rear extension to provide new commuter facilities and installation of associated plant; erection of bin store; and improvements to rear car park and cycle parking facilities)
decision_conditions: The applicant is informed that the submitted details have been assessed by relevant consultee and are hereby approved subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the approved details, in relation to Condition 9 (Piling Method Statement) of planning permission 21/00646/FUL, which states:Before any piling takes place, a piling method statement shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Any piling must be undertaken in accordance with the terms of the approved piling method statement.Reason: To safeguard the amenity of the neighbours by minimising impacts of the development that would otherwise give rise to nuisance in accordance with Policy DM10 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012).
Please provide the plan and roof plan of proposed outbuilding in recognisable scale such as 1:100 or 1:50.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
